弁当持参: (べんとうじさん) - (yoji) bringing one's own lunch

弁慶の立往生: (べんけいのたちおうじょう) - situation in which one can move neither forward nor backward

弄くり回す: (いじくりまわす) - to fiddle with; to monkey around with
弄くる: (いじくる) - to finger; to tamper (with)

弄りまわす: (いじりまわす) - to tinker with; to fumble with; to twist up
弄り回す: (いじりまわす) - to tinker with; to fumble with; to twist up
弄る: (ijiru) - to finger, to touch, to play with, to fiddle with, to toy with; to make changes to, to tinker with, to tamper with , to finger, to touch, to play with, to fiddle with, to toy with; to make changes to, to tinker with, to tamper with; to dabble in, to do as a hobby, to play around with; to grope, to feel around (no bolso, na bolsa, etc.)
弄繰り回す: (いじくりまわす) - to fiddle with; to monkey around with
弊える: (ついえる) - to use up (one's savings); to be wasted (time, effort, etc); (esp. 潰える) to fall apart/to become useless; (esp. 潰える) to be wiped out (in battle); (esp. 潰える) to fall apart (one's body or health)
弊害: (heigai) - efeito prejudicial, influência nociva, prática maléfica, abuso, enfermidade
弊村: (へいそん) - poor village; our own (little or poor) village
